description: A hiking guidebook for visitors or locals who want to explore one of Canada's most scenic natural environments. This guidebook covers hikes in beautiful Waterton National Park, where the prairies meet the slopes of the Canadian Rockies. It features a wide range of choices for day trippers looking for unique and irresistible views throughout this world-renowned mountain range. With 34 trails from easy, short day walks to scrambles, there is something in this book for everyone.
name: Popular Day Hikes Waterton
